name: Ouroboros: The Spinning Blade
description:
Made all alone by myself in Construct 3 in 50hrs for the JimJam #2 (Theme was "Ouroboros")

You play as a baby Ouroboros that has to retrieve the stolen tail from the evil Alchemist that want to use it to create the Philosophers Ston!

Little Metroidvania like game, hope you like it! There are 12 Areas, 4 Skills and 1 Power Up (Health Upgrades) plus a Final Boss and it has a little twist ending hehe, instructions below!

Z to Spin

X to Jump

C to close messages

Drop down moving platforms using the Down Arrow

Art made with PyxelEdit

SFX BFXR

Music BeepBox
